entity.name: Complement
entity.description:
A Complement is a relationship that is between:
set S1;
set U; and
set S2,
that indicates set S2 consists of all members of U that are not members of S1.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: an identifier for the complement relationship.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: word or sequence of words by which the complement relationship is referenced.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: description of the complement relationship.

explicit.name: set_1
explicit.description: the class that has set_2 as its complement within universe.

explicit.name: set_2
explicit.description: the class that has set_1 as its complement within universe.

explicit.name: universe
explicit.description: the class that is the union of set_1 and set_2.

entity.name: Intersection
entity.description:
An Intersection is a relationship that is between:
set R;
and set of sets {Si},
that indicates set R consists of each thing that is a member of each set within {Si}.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: an identifier for the intersection relationship.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: word or sequence of words by which the intersection relationship is referenced.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: a description of the intersection relationship.

explicit.name: operand
explicit.description: the set of sets that have the resultant as their intersection.

explicit.name: resultant
explicit.description: the set that consists of each thing that is a member of each set within operand.

entity.name: Power_set
entity.description:
A power set is a relationship that is between:
set S; and
set S*
and that indicates S* is the set of all subsets of S.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: an identifier for the power_set relationship.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: word or sequence of words by which the power_set relationship is referenced.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: a description of the power_set relationship.

explicit.name: base
explicit.description: the set that is the union of the derived.

explicit.name: derived
explicit.description: the set of all subsets of the base.

entity.name: Proper_subset
entity.description:
A proper_subset is a relationship that is between:
set A; and
set B.
that indicates:
each member of set A is also a member of set B; and
set A does not equal set B.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: an identifier for the proper_subset relationship.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: word or sequence of words by which the proper_subset relationship is referenced.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: a description of the proper_subset relationship.

explicit.name: subset
explicit.description: the class that contains only members of superset.

explicit.name: superset
explicit.description: the class that contains all members of subset.

entity.name: Same_membership
entity.description:
A same membership is a relationship that is between:
set S1;
set S2,
that indicates the sets have the same members, i.e. that they are equal.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: an identifier for the same_membership relationship.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: word or sequence of words by which the same_membership relationship is referenced.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: a description of the same_membership relationship.

explicit.name: set_1
explicit.description: set_1: the class that contains the same members as set_2.

explicit.name: set_2
explicit.description: set_2: the class that contains the same members as set_1.

entity.name: Subset
entity.description:
A subset is a relationship that is between:
set A; and
set B.
that indicates:
each member of set A is also a member of set B. Set A may be equal to set B.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: an identifier for the subset relationship.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: word or sequence of words by which the subset relationship is referenced.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: a description of the subset relationship.

explicit.name: subset
explicit.description: the class that contains only members of superset.

explicit.name: superset
explicit.description: the class that contains all members of subset.

entity.name: Union
entity.description:
A Union is a relationship that is between:
set R;
and set of sets {Si},
that indicates set R consists of each thing that is a member of any set within {Si}.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: an identifier for the union relationship.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: word or sequence of words by which the union relationship is referenced.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: a description of the union relationship.

explicit.name: operand
explicit.description: the set of sets that have the resultant as their union.

explicit.name: resultant
explicit.description: the set that consists of each thing that is a member of any set within operand.
